description: A grotesque and malformed piglet with a twisted body, sharp tusks, and a menacing red glow in its eyes. The Twisted Piglet is a result of dark magic gone awry, and it roams the wilderness with a feral hunger for flesh.

traits.name: Ferocious Charge
traits.description: If the Twisted Piglet moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a tusk attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 5 (2d4) slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 12 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Tusk
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.
